Spanish.Text: Libro de la historia:Libros de la historia

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temples[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and culture. They are especially useful for expanding your civilization's borders during the early game.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]temples[COLOR_REVERT] améliorent le bonheur et la culture des villes, très utiles pour agrandir vos frontières culturelles au début du jeu.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Tempel[COLOR_REVERT] steigern die Zufriedenheit und Kultur einer Stadt. In den frühen Spielphasen eignen sie sich hervorragend zur Erweiterung der Grenzgebiete der eigenen Zivilisation.
TEXT.Italian: I [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]templi[COLOR_REVERT] aumentano la felicità e la cultura della città. Sono particolarmente indicati per espandere i confini della tua civiltà durante le fasi iniziali della partita.
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Templos[COLOR_REVERT] aumentan la felicidad y cultura de la ciudad. Son especialmente útiles para expandir las fronteras de la civilización al principio de la partida.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Academy[COLOR_REVERT] increases a city's scientific research as well as providing a small amount of culture.

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Peut modifier le taux de commerce de %F1_CmrcIcon

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Administrative Center[COLOR_REVERT] reduces the maintenance costs in nearby cities. It increases the chances of creating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Peut convoyer %d1_Num [NUM1:unité terrestre:unités terrestres] par voie aérienne par tour
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Permette il trasporto aereo di %d1_Num unità [NUM1:terrestre:terrestri] per turno

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Airports[COLOR_REVERT] add an additional trade route, provide an experience bonus to all Air Units, house four extra Air Units for a total of eight and can airlift one unit per turn to any of your other cities. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Airports[COLOR_REVERT] also add unhealthiness.

Spanish.Text: Torre de radiodifusión estadounidense:Torres de radiodifusión estadounidenses

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mall[COLOR_REVERT], the American replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Supermarket[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Electricity[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Refrigeration[COLOR_REVERT] technology, increases the city's commerce output, allows you to hire a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and increases the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Football Events[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Singles[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Movies[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% a la duración de la anarquía

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%% wait between Civics or State Religion changes
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%% d'attente entre les changements de doctrine ou de religion d'état
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%% Wartezeit bei Änderungen von Staatsform oder Staatsreligion.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%% di attesa al cambiamento di forma di governo o religione di stato
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%% de espera entre los cambios de principios o de religión oficial

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET][LINK=SPECIALIST_ARTIST]Artists[\LINK] can also be hired using [LINK=SPECIALIST_PRIEST]Priest[\LINK] slots.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET][LINK=SPECIALIST_ARTIST]Künstler[\LINK] können auch mithilfe von [LINK=SPECIALIST_PRIEST]Priester[\LINK] plätze eingestellt werden.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wat Preah Pisnulok[COLOR_REVERT] adds an additional population point in all cities. Further, it allows Artists to be hired using Priest slots. It increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

[ICON_BULLET]Relocates the [LINK=RELIGION_CHRISTIANITY]Catholic[\LINK] holy city[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2[ICON_PRODUCTION] from All [LINK=RELIGION_CHRISTIANITY]Catholic[\LINK] Buildings (For all Players)[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]First to Build will Begin the [LINK=RELIGION_ORTHODOXY]Great Schism[\LINK]

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Apostolic Palace[COLOR_REVERT] triggers [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Diplomatic[COLOR_REVERT] elections. It guarantees that you will be a candidate in those elections, spreads Catholicism, relocates the Catholic holy city to this city, gives a production bonus to Catholic buildings in all civilizations and founds Orthodoxy. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Madrassa[COLOR_REVERT], the Arabian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Library[COLOR_REVERT], provides double the culture and allows you to hire two [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialists.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cold Storage Plant[COLOR_REVERT], the Argentine replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Supermarket[COLOR_REVERT], increases the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cows[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Deer[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pigs[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Artemis[COLOR_REVERT] increases its city's trade route income and gives a free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT]. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
[ICON_BULLET]Allows [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT][LINK=UNIT_SETTLER]Settlers[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT] to be built on any continent

Spanish.Text: Altar de sacrificios azteca:Altares de sacrificios aztecas

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sacrificial Altar[COLOR_REVERT], the Aztec replacements for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Courthouse[COLOR_REVERT], reduces the anger duration from sacrificing population and is cheaper.
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Garden[COLOR_REVERT], the Babylonian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colosseum[COLOR_REVERT], provides two bonus health in addition to the usual happiness bonus.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]jardin[COLOR_REVERT] (bâtiment babylonien qui remplace le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colisée[COLOR_REVERT]) confère deux points de santé supplémentaires en plus du bonus de bonheur habituel.
TEXT.German: Der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Garten[COLOR_REVERT], die babylonische Variante des [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kolosseums[COLOR_REVERT], gewährt neben dem üblichen Zufriedenheitsbonus auch einen Gesundheitsbonus von 2.
TEXT.Italian: Il [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Giardino[COLOR_REVERT], l'equivalente babilonese del [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colosseo[COLOR_REVERT], dà due bonus di salute oltre al classico bonus di felicità.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jardín[COLOR_REVERT], el sustituto babilonio del [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Coliseo[COLOR_REVERT], proporciona una bonificación de 2 a la salud, además de la habitual bonificación a la felicidad.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Banks[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increase a city's production of wealth. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Banks[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stock Exchange[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Athian Barracks[COLOR_REVERT] provide the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Flanking I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion to units built in this city.
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]caserne athénienne[COLOR_REVERT] octroie la promotion [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Contournement I[COLOR_REVERT] aux unités produites dans cette ville.
TEXT.German: Durch die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Athenischen Kasernen[COLOR_REVERT] erhalten alle Einheiten, die in der betreffenden Stadt ausgebildet werden, die Beförderung [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Flanke I[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]caserme Ateniesi[COLOR_REVERT] forniscono la promozione [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Attacco laterale I[COLOR_REVERT] a tutte le unità costruite in questa città.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cuartel ateniense[COLOR_REVERT] proporciona el ascenso [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Flanqueo I[COLOR_REVERT] a las unidades creadas en la ciudad.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Barbarian Barracks[COLOR_REVERT] provide the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]City Raider I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion to units built in this city.
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]caserne barbare[COLOR_REVERT] octroie la promotion [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pillage de ville I[COLOR_REVERT] aux unités produites dans cette ville.
TEXT.German: Durch die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Barbarischen Kasernen[COLOR_REVERT] erhalten alle Einheiten, die in der betreffenden Stadt ausgebildet werden, die Beförderung [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Häuserkampf I[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]caserme Barbare[COLOR_REVERT] forniscono la promozione [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Razziatore I[COLOR_REVERT] a tutte le unità costruite in questa città.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cuartel bárbaro[COLOR_REVERT] proporciona el ascenso [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Asalto de ciudades I[COLOR_REVERT] a las unidades creadas en la ciudad.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Macedonian Barracks[COLOR_REVERT] provide the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Flanking I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion to units built in this city. In addition [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Mounted Units[COLOR_REVERT] will receive +2 experience points.
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]caserne macédonienne[COLOR_REVERT] octroie la promotion [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Contournement I[COLOR_REVERT] aux unités produites dans cette ville. Par ailleurs, les [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]unités montées[COLOR_REVERT] recevront +2 points d'expérience.
TEXT.German: Durch die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Makedonischen Kasernen[COLOR_REVERT] erhalten alle Einheiten, die in der betreffenden Stadt ausgebildet werden, die Beförderung [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Flanke I[COLOR_REVERT]. Darüber hinaus gewinnen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Berittene Einheiten[COLOR_REVERT] +2 Erfahrungspunkte hinzu.
TEXT.Italian: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]caserme Macedoni[COLOR_REVERT] forniscono la promozione [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Attacco laterale I[COLOR_REVERT] a tutte le unità costruite in questa città. Inoltre le [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]unità montate[COLOR_REVERT] ricevono +2 XP.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cuartel macedonio[COLOR_REVERT] proporciona el ascenso [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Flanqueo I[COLOR_REVERT] a las unidades creadas en la ciudad. Además, las [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Unidades montadas[COLOR_REVERT] reciben + 2 puntos de experiencia.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Spartan Barracks[COLOR_REVERT] provide the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Guerilla I I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion to units built in this city.
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]caserne spartiate[COLOR_REVERT] octroie la promotion [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Guérilla I[COLOR_REVERT] aux unités produites dans cette ville.
TEXT.German: Durch die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Spartanischen Kasernen[COLOR_REVERT] erhalten alle Einheiten, die in der betreffenden Stadt ausgebildet werden, die Beförderung [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Guerilla I[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]caserme Spartane[COLOR_REVERT] forniscono la promozione [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Guerriglia I[COLOR_REVERT] a tutte le unità costruite in questa città.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cuartel espartano[COLOR_REVERT] proporciona el ascenso [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Guerrilla I[COLOR_REVERT] a las unidades creadas en la ciudad.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Barracks[COLOR_REVERT] grant experience points to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Land Units[COLOR_REVERT] built in its city.

TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% a la tasa de natalidad de [ICON_GREATPEOPLE]

TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] tasso di natalità in tutte le città
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% a la tasa de natalidad de [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] en todas las ciudades

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Blue Mosque[COLOR_REVERT] removes all unhappiness from the city in which it is built. It increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bomb Shelters[COLOR_REVERT] reduce damage from nuclear attacks.
[ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% Damage to Defenses from Bombardment (Except vs. Gunpowder-based Units)
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% Dégâts infligés aux défenses après un bombardement (sauf contre les unités à poudre)
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% di danni alle difese a causa del bombardamento (tranne contro unità che utilizzano la povere da sparo)
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% de daño a las defensas por cañoneo (excepto contra unidades con armas de pólvora)

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Prevents Barbarians from Entering Borders on Continent
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Empêche les Barbares de franchir les frontières du continent
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Hindert Barbaren an der Überquerung der kontinentalen Grenzen
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Impedisce ai barbari di superare i confini sul continente
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Impide que los bárbaros traspasen las fronteras del continente.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Borobudur[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to hire three [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialists and adds additional production to all of your [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. It also increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Brandenburg Gate[COLOR_REVERT] doubles the amount of great general points you receive inside your cultural borders. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Fazenda[COLOR_REVERT], the Brazilian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grocer[COLOR_REVERT], increases the city's health with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT] and also increases the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bananas[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tobacco[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Broadcast Towers[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increase a city's cultural output. They also increase the happiness output from using the culture slider, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Football Events[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Singles[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Movies[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wembley[COLOR_REVERT] provides your civilization with seven [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Football Event[COLOR_REVERT] resources (which provide happiness). It increases the odds that its city will generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stupa[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Buddhist Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buddhism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Buddhist Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Buddhist Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mahabodhi[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Buddhist Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buddhism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buddhism[COLOR_REVERT] throughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Buddhist Temples[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and culture.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hippodrome[COLOR_REVERT], the Byzantine replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theatre[COLOR_REVERT], increases happiness, increases the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses[COLOR_REVERT], doubles the happiness output from using the culture slider and loses one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Royal Canadian Mounted Police[COLOR_REVERT], the Canadian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jail[COLOR_REVERT], provides extra happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cothon[COLOR_REVERT], the Carthaginian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harbor[COLOR_REVERT], significantly increases that city's income from trade routes. It increases a city's health from access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Clam[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Crab[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fish[COLOR_REVERT] resources.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT] increase your cities' defense against pre-gunpowder units, increase espionage output, generate a small amount of culture and also provide one extra trade route.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Catholic Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Catholicism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Catholic Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Catholic Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Church of the Holy Sepulchre[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Catholic Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Catholicism[COLOR_REVERT]. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Catholicism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Churches[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Catholic Temples[COLOR_REVERT]) increase a city's happiness and culture. They also allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Dun[COLOR_REVERT], the Celtic replacement for [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Walls[COLOR_REVERT], gives all eligible units built in this city the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Guerrilla I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]CERN Research Complex[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases the scientific output of its city. It also allows you to hire three [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] specialists and increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Kukulkan[COLOR_REVERT] increases all cities' defenses by 25%%. It improves the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

Spanish.Text: Palacio del gobernador chino:Palacios del gobernador chino

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taixue[COLOR_REVERT], the Chinese replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Library[COLOR_REVERT], provides extra culture and allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Statesman[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.

A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pavillion[COLOR_REVERT], the Chinese replacement for a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theatre[COLOR_REVERT], significantly increases a city's culture and increases the happiness output from using the culture slider.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]monastères[COLOR_REVERT] permettent de former des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]missionnaires[COLOR_REVERT], qui peuvent propager leur foi dans d'autres villes. Ils génèrent également de la culture et accélèrent légèrement la recherche.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Klöster[COLOR_REVERT] ermöglichen die Ausbildung von [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missionaren[COLOR_REVERT]. Diese verkünden in anderen Städten Ihren Glauben, steigern den kulturellen Wert und beschleunigen die Forschung.
TEXT.Italian: I [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]monasteri[COLOR_REVERT] permettono la realizzazione dei [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]missionari[COLOR_REVERT], in grado di diffondere la fede in altre città. Inoltre, forniscono cultura e un piccolo aumento di ricerca.
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monasterios[COLOR_REVERT] permiten crear [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Misioneros[COLOR_REVERT], que pueden propagar la fe por otras ciudades. También proporcionan cultura y un cierto empuje a la investigación.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temples[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and culture. They are especially useful for expanding your civilization's borders during the early game.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]CN Tower[COLOR_REVERT] puts a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Broadcast Tower[COLOR_REVERT] in every city. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Coal Plants[COLOR_REVERT] provide power and unhealthiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coal[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change Routes commerciales dans toutes les villes [LINK=TERRAIN_COAST]côtières[\LINK]
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change rotte commerciali in tutte le città [LINK=TERRAIN_COAST]costiere[\LINK]
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change rutas comerciales en todas las ciudades [LINK=TERRAIN_COAST]costeras[\LINK]

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hacienda[COLOR_REVERT], the Colombian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grocer[COLOR_REVERT], increases the city's health with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT] and also increases the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bananas[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Amphitheatres[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and its happiness output from using the culture slider.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colossus[COLOR_REVERT] adds extra commerce to all water tiles in your coastal cities. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kong Miao[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Confucian Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Confucianism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Confucian Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Confucian Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kong Lin[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Confucian Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Confucianism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Confucianism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Confucian Temples[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and culture.

Build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cereal Mills[COLOR_REVERT] Headquarters to create the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cereal Mills Corporation[COLOR_REVERT], which consumes [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wheat[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Corn[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rice[COLOR_REVERT] and adds a food bonus to cities where the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cereal Mills Corporation[COLOR_REVERT] is present. The Headquarters provide gold for each city in the world with a Cereal Mills franchise.
TEXT.French: Construisez le siège des [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grands Moulins céréaliers[COLOR_REVERT] pour créer la société commerciale [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Grands Moulins céréaliers[COLOR_REVERT], qui consomme du [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]blé[COLOR_REVERT], du [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]maïs[COLOR_REVERT] ou du [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]riz[COLOR_REVERT] et confère un bonus de nourriture aux villes où les [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Grands Moulins céréaliers[COLOR_REVERT] sont présents. Il confère également un bonus culturel et un bonus d'or.
TEXT.German: Der Bau des Unternehmenssitzes der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cereal Mills[COLOR_REVERT] bildet die Grundlage für die Errichtung der Kapitalgesellschaft [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cereal Mills Inc.[COLOR_REVERT], welche [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Weizen[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Mais[COLOR_REVERT] oder [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Reis[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeitet. Die [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cereal Mills Inc.[COLOR_REVERT] gewährt jeder Stadt, in der sie vertreten ist, einen Nahrungsmittelbonus. Der Unternehmenssitz bringt allen Städten der Welt mit einem Cereal Mills-Franchise Gold ein.

[COLOR_REVERT], que consume [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Carbón[COLOR_REVERT] y suma [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Aluminio[COLOR_REVERT] y una bonificación de investigación en toda ciudad donde la corporación esté presente. TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Courthouses[COLOR_REVERT] lower city maintenance costs, provide you with a bonus to espionage and are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Administrative Centers[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cristo Redentor[COLOR_REVERT] allows its builder to switch [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Religions[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Civics[COLOR_REVERT] instantly once per turn, with no anarchy. It also increases the chances of a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT] appearing.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Christ rédempteur[COLOR_REVERT] permet à son constructeur de changer de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]religion[COLOR_REVERT] ou de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]doctrine[COLOR_REVERT] instantanément, une fois par tour et sans période d'anarchie. Il augmente aussi les chances qu'un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]ingénieur illustre[COLOR_REVERT] apparaisse.
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cristo Redentor[COLOR_REVERT]-Statue ermöglicht ihrem Erbauer, einmal pro Runde augenblicklich die [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Religion[COLOR_REVERT] oder [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Staatsform[COLOR_REVERT] zu wechseln, ohne dadurch Anarchie zu verursachen. Sie erhöht auch die Wahrscheinlichkeit, dass ein [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großer Ingenieur[COLOR_REVERT] auftaucht.
TEXT.Italian: Il [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cristo Redentore[COLOR_REVERT] permette a chi lo costruisce di cambiare [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Religione[COLOR_REVERT] o [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Forma di governo[COLOR_REVERT] istantaneamente una volta per turno, senza generare anarchia. Aumenta inoltre le probabilità che appaia un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grande Ingegnere[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cristo Redentor[COLOR_REVERT] permite a su constructor cambiar instantáneamente de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]religión[COLOR_REVERT] o de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]principios[COLOR_REVERT] una vez por turno, sin sufrir los efectos de la anarquía. También aumenta las posibilidades de que aparezca un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]gran ingeniero[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Customs Houses[COLOR_REVERT] increase the commerce generated by a city's Foreign Trade Routes.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Dome of the Rock[COLOR_REVERT] decreases war weariness in all cities in your civilization and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.Italian: Raddoppia la velocità di produzione con [LINK=literal]%s1_Bonus[\LINK]
TEXT.Spanish: Dobla la velocidad de producción con [LINK=literal]%s1_Bonus[\LINK]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Drydocks[COLOR_REVERT] build [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Naval Units[COLOR_REVERT] much faster and grant [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Naval Units[COLOR_REVERT] experience points, but also add unhealthiness to the city.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Obelisk[COLOR_REVERT], the Egyptian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT], provides a major bonus to Culture output in your city and allows you to hire a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
[ICON_BULLET]Golden Ages Consume at most Three Great People
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Goldene Zeitalter verbrauchen höchstens drei große Persönlichkeiten

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Eiffel Tower[COLOR_REVERT] grants a culture boost and also limits the amount of great people consumed in a golden age to 3. Its city has an improved chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Garantiza la validez de los votos diplomáticos

TEXT.Spanish: Establece contacto permanente con otras civilizaciones

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Provides [ICON_GOLD] bonus equal to the city's population.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Empire State Building[COLOR_REVERT] provides a gold bonus equal to the population of the city in which it's built. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Vos ennemis subissent %D1_percent%% de lassitude liée à la guerre
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]I nemici subiscono il %D1_percent%% di Stanchezza della guerra
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Los enemigos sufren un %D1_percent%% de hastío bélico

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Royal Exchange[COLOR_REVERT], the English replacement for a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bank[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's production of wealth more.

TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% a la defensa contra el espionaje

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stele[COLOR_REVERT], the Ethiopian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT], allows you to hire two [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialists.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factories[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's production at the cost of adding significant unhealthiness. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factories[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Industrial Parks[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Coal Plants[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hydro Plants[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nuclear Plants[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colosseum[COLOR_REVERT] increases its city's production when creating military units and grants experience points to units built in this city. It also increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Chinampa[COLOR_REVERT] give a large food bonus as well as increasing its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forbidden Palace[COLOR_REVERT] reduces civic maintenance costs. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% al rendimento delle rotte commerciali straniere
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% al rendimiento de las rutas comerciales internacionales

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] increase production, increases the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gems[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gold[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silver[COLOR_REVERT], but also adds unhealthiness. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Eiffel Tower[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statue of Liberty[COLOR_REVERT] world wonders, and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ironworks[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
[ICON_BULLET]Free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT][LINK=literal]%s1_Name[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT] Promotion for Units Built in this City
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Promotion gratuite [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]([LINK=literal]%s1_Name[\LINK])[COLOR_REVERT] pour les unités construites dans cette ville
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Freie Beförderung zu [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT][LINK=literal]%s1_Name[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT] für die in dieser Stadt errichteten Einheiten
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Promozione [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT][LINK=literal]%s1_Name[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT] gratuita per le unità costruite in questa città.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Da gratis el ascenso de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT][LINK=literal]%s1_Name[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT] a las unidades construidas en esta ciudad

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change spécialistes gratuits dans toutes les villes
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change specialisti gratuiti in tutt le città
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change especialistas gratis en todas las ciudades

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change Free Specialists in All Cities on this Continent
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change spécialiste gratuit dans toutes les villes sur ce continent
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change freie(n) Spezialisten in allen Städten dieses Kontinents
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change specialisti gratuiti in tutte le città di questo continente.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change especialistas gratis en todas las ciudades de este continente

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Disponible gratuitement à l'époque "%s1_EraName" et pour les débuts de partie plus tardifs
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Disponible gratis a partir [NUM1:del:de la:de los:de las] %s1_EraName e inicios posteriores
