TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]1 freie Technologie aus Ihrer aktuellen oder früheren Zeitaltern

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]1 Free Technology from your current or earlier Era
[ICON_BULLET]New Units Receive %D1_Change Experience Points in All Cities
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Les nouvelles unités bénéficient de %D1_Change EXP dans toutes les villes
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Neue Einheiten erhalten %D1_Change Erfahrungspunkte in allen Städten
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Le nuove unità %D1_Change ricevono punti esperienza in tutte le città
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Las nuevas unidades reciben %D1_Change [NUM1:punto de experiencia:puntos de experiencia] en todas las ciudades
[ICON_BULLET]Las nuevas unidades reciben %D1_Change [NUM1:punto de experiencia:puntos de experiencia]

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Salon[COLOR_REVERT], the French replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jail[COLOR_REVERT], provides a cultural bonus, a happiness bonus if the city has access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tea[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tobacco[COLOR_REVERT] and increases the birthrate of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great People[COLOR_REVERT].
Unique Argentine building which replaces the supermarket. Provides additional gold with cow, pig and sheep.

TEXT.French: [SPACE]de tous les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT][LINK=literal]%s1_SpclstName[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT] dans toutes les villes

TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% a la aparición de Gran general

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Assembly Plant[COLOR_REVERT], the German replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factory[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's unit production, gives one free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Engineer[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and is produced 50% faster with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coal[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change di popolazione in tutte le città
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change de población en todas las ciudades

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Opera House[COLOR_REVERT] increases the cultural output of the city as well as increasing the city's happiness. It increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% a la duración de la edad de oro

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Granaries[COLOR_REVERT] store food to help increase a city's growth rate.
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grand Canal[COLOR_REVERT] adds extra commerce to all river tiles in your city. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Cothon[COLOR_REVERT] add a bonus production to every water tile in the city in which it's constructed. It also increases the chances of a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] appearing. The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Cothan[COLOR_REVERT] requires you to have the Pantheon civic active.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Library[COLOR_REVERT] gives its city two free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] gives one additional trade route and one additional trade routes to all coastal cities. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
[ICON_BULLET]Reduced Enemy Movement Speed Within the Walls.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Barbarian Units Take Damage within the Walls
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Geringere Bewegung feindlicher Einheiten innerhalb der Mauern.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Barbarische Einheiten nehmen Schaden innerhalb der Mauern

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Wall[COLOR_REVERT] reduces enemy speed within your borders and also damages barbarians within your borders. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Odeon[COLOR_REVERT], the Greek replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theatre[COLOR_REVERT], increase a city's happiness, requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Aesthetics[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Drama[COLOR_REVERT] technology and allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Statesman[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grocers[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's wealth. It also increases the city's health with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bananas[COLOR_REVERT]. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grocers[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Supermarkets[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hagia Sophia[COLOR_REVERT] causes your workers to build improvements much faster, and it increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sainte Sophie[COLOR_REVERT] permet à vos ouvriers de construire les aménagements bien plus vite et augmente les chances d'apparition d'un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]ingénieur illustre[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hagia Sophia[COLOR_REVERT] beschleunigt den Bau von Modernisierungen und erhöht die Chancen einer Stadt, einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen Ingenieur[COLOR_REVERT] hervorzubringen.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Santa Sofia[COLOR_REVERT] permette ai lavoratori di costruire i miglioramenti più velocemente e aumenta la probabilità di generare un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grande Ingegnere[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Santa Sofía[COLOR_REVERT] hace que los trabajadores construyan mejoras mucho más rápido y aumenta las probabilidades de que en su ciudad se genere un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gran ingeniero[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hanging Gardens[COLOR_REVERT] improves the health of your city and adds an additional population point in all cities. It increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_change[ICON_HAPPY] pour les dirigeants avec le trait %s2_trait

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change%F2_HappyOrUn in All Cities on this Continent
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change%F2_HappyOrUn dans toutes les villes sur ce continent
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change %F2_HappyOrUn in tutte le città di questo continente
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change %F2_HappyOrUn en todas las ciudades de este continente

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bath[COLOR_REVERT], the Harappan replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueduct[COLOR_REVERT], doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Mathematics[COLOR_REVERT] technology, is cheaper and provides culture.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harbors[COLOR_REVERT] improve the food output of water plots. A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harbor[COLOR_REVERT] is required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Customs Houses[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]San Marco Basilica[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Trafalgar Square[COLOR_REVERT] world wonders.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harmandir Sahib[COLOR_REVERT] grants experience points to troops built in all cities with your state religion. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Cura le unità del %d1_Mod%% di danno extra per turno.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Cura a las unidades un %d1_Mod%% de daño extra por turno

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change%F2_HealthOrUn in All Cities on this Continent
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change%F2_HealthOrUn dans toutes les villes sur ce continent
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change %F2_HealthOrUn in tutte le città di questo continente
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change %F2_HealthOrUn en todas las ciudades de este continente

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Provides fresh water to the city[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All newly founded cities receive one additional point of population
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Versorgt die Stadt mit Süßwasser[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Alle neu gegründeten Städte erhalten einen zusätzlichen Bevölkerungspunkt

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]All units built in cities with your state religion receive +2 experience
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Alle Einheiten, die in Städten mit Staatsreligion ausgebildet werden, erhalten +2 Erfahrung

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]City defense increases culture output in all cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_CULTURE] per level of every fully fortified unit in the city
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Stadtverteidigung erhöht Kulturausstoß in allen Städten[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_CULTURE] pro Level für jede vollständig befestigte Einheit in der Stadt

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]State Religion buildings are constructed twice as fast
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Gebäude der Staatsreligion werden doppelt so schnell gebaut

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]All trade routes in your civilization are counted as foreign
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Gallery[COLOR_REVERT] doubles its city's cultural output and increases its chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nationalgalerie[COLOR_REVERT] verdoppelt den kulturellen Ausstoß einer Stadt. Außerdem erhöht es die Chancen einer Stadt, einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen Künstler[COLOR_REVERT] hervorzubringen.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Himeji Castle[COLOR_REVERT] makes city defence increases culture output and makes all fully fortified units provide +1 culture. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ksetra[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hindu Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hindu Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hindu Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kashi Vishwanath[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hindu Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hindu Temples[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and culture. The first player to build a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hindu Temple[COLOR_REVERT] founds Buddhism.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hollywood[COLOR_REVERT] provides your civilization with seven [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Movies[COLOR_REVERT] resources (which provide happiness). It increases the odds that its city will generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Rathaus[COLOR_REVERT], the German replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Courthouse[COLOR_REVERT], lowers city maintenance costs even further.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hospitals[COLOR_REVERT] help units heal damage more quickly and adds health to a city. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hospitals[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Red Cross Society[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Durée de colère après avoir un sacrifice de population%D1_percent%%
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_percent%% di durata del malcontento per aver sacrificato la popolazione
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_percent%% a la duración del hastío por sacrificar población
[ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% al coste de acelerar la producción

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Tambo[COLOR_REVERT], the Incan replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castle[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Construction[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Engineering[COLOR_REVERT] technology and generates extra culture.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Terraces[COLOR_REVERT], the Incan replacements for [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Granaries[COLOR_REVERT], provide a small amount of culture and store food to help increase a city's growth rate. They add additional health if your civ has access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Corn[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wheat[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rice[COLOR_REVERT].
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Edict[COLOR_REVERT], the Indian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT], lowers city maintenance costs and never goes obsolete.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mausoleum[COLOR_REVERT], the Mughal replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jail[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Patronage[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Constitution[COLOR_REVERT] technology, provides a free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT] and allows you to hire one extra [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Statesman[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stepwell[COLOR_REVERT], the Indian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueduct[COLOR_REVERT], doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Mathematics[COLOR_REVERT] technology.
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Candi[COLOR_REVERT], the Indonesian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT], provides one culture, one production and never goes obsolete.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Industrial Parks[COLOR_REVERT] provides a free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Engineer[COLOR_REVERT] specialist. This comes at a significant cost to your city's health.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Intelligence Agencies[COLOR_REVERT] increase the espionage points created by the city and grant experience points to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Espionage Units[COLOR_REVERT] built in their city.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Caravanserai[COLOR_REVERT], the Iranian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT], provides an extra trade route, increases the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silk[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ironworks[COLOR_REVERT] increases a city's production if that city has access to coal and/or iron, but also adds unhealthiness. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: L'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]usine sidérurgique[COLOR_REVERT] augmente la production d'une ville si celle-ci dispose de charbon et/ou de fer, mais aux dépens de la santé des habitants. Elle augmente les chances d'apparition d'un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]ingénieur illustre[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Eisenverarbeitung[COLOR_REVERT] steigert in Städten mit Zugriff auf Kohle und/oder Eisen die Produktion, wirkt sich aber negativ auf die Gesundheit der Bevölkerung aus. Darüber hinaus erhöht sie die Chancen der Stadt, einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen Ingenieur[COLOR_REVERT] hervorzubringen.
TEXT.Italian: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ferrieria[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta la produzione della città se ha accesso a carbone e/o ferro, ma genera infelicità. Inoltre, aumenta la probabilità di generare un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grande Ingegnere[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Metalurgia[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta la producción de la ciudad si ésta tiene acceso a carbón o hierro, pero también aumenta su insalubridad. Incrementa también las posibilidades de que en su ciudad se genere un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gran ingeniero[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ishtar Gate[COLOR_REVERT] increases war weariness in the cities of those who go to war against its builder. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mosque[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Islamic Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Islam[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Islamic Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Islamic Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Masjid al-Haram[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Islamic Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Islam[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Islam[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Islamic Temples[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and culture.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Art Studio[COLOR_REVERT], the Italian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forge[COLOR_REVERT], provides a big culture boost and allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jails[COLOR_REVERT] lower a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]War Weariness[COLOR_REVERT] and increase espionage significantly.

Italian.Text: Accademia giapponese di bushido:Accademie giapponesi di bushido

Spanish.Text: Academia japonesa de Bushido:Academias japonesas de Bushido

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kaizen Plant[COLOR_REVERT], the Japanese replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Coal Plant[COLOR_REVERT], provides power for the Factory, although the pollution will hurt your city's health. It also increases your city's production, allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and provides a free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Engineer[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zaibatsu[COLOR_REVERT], the Japanese replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factory[COLOR_REVERT], is cheaper, gives one free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Engineer[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and improves the commerce output of water plots.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]monastères[COLOR_REVERT] permettent de former des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]missionnaires[COLOR_REVERT] qui peuvent propager la foi dans les autres villes. Ils améliorent aussi la culture d'une ville et accélèrent légèrement sa recherche.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Klöster[COLOR_REVERT] ermöglichen die Ausbildung von [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missionaren[COLOR_REVERT]. Diese verkünden in anderen Städten Ihren Glauben, steigern den kulturellen Wert und beschleunigen die Forschung.
TEXT.Italian: I [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]monasteri[COLOR_REVERT] permettono la realizzazione dei [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]missionari[COLOR_REVERT], in grado di diffondere la fede in altre città. Inoltre, forniscono cultura e un piccolo aumento di ricerca.
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monasterios[COLOR_REVERT] permiten crear [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Misioneros[COLOR_REVERT], que pueden propagar la fe por otras ciudades. También proporcionan cultura y un cierto empuje a la investigación.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temples[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and culture. They are especially useful for expanding your civilization's borders during the early game.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lubyanka[COLOR_REVERT] adds additional espionage to all of your specialists. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Khajuraho[COLOR_REVERT] doubles the construction speed of the buildings of your state religion. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Baray[COLOR_REVERT], the Khmer replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueduct[COLOR_REVERT], provides one extra food.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mbwadi[COLOR_REVERT], the Congolese replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT], increases the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cotton[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Seowon[COLOR_REVERT], the Korean replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]University[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Paper[COLOR_REVERT] technology and doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Education[COLOR_REVERT] technology.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]St. Basil's Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] adds additional espionage to all buildings of your state religion and it increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Laboratories[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's scientific research and its spaceship production, but also add unhealthiness.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Leaning Tower[COLOR_REVERT] increases the rate at which your civilization generates [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great People[COLOR_REVERT]. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Levees[COLOR_REVERT] provide a production bonus from all river tiles worked by the city.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libraries[COLOR_REVERT] boost your city's research and provide culture. They are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Universities[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lighthouses[COLOR_REVERT] increase that city's income from trade routes and increase that city's health from access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Clam[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Crab[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fish[COLOR_REVERT] resources.

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]La ville a plus de chance de générer : [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT][LINK=literal]%s1_GPName[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Erhöhte Wahrscheinlichkeit der Erzeugung von [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT][LINK=literal]%s1_GPName[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT] in der Stadt
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]La città ha maggiori probabilità di generare un [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT][LINK=literal]%s1_GPName[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Es más probable que la ciudad genere a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT][LINK=literal]%s1_GPName[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Machu Picchu[COLOR_REVERT] provides 2 gold for every [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Peak[COLOR_REVERT] in the city's radius. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mint[COLOR_REVERT], the Mandinka replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forge[COLOR_REVERT], provides a small increase in wealth.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Markets[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's wealth. They also increase the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ivory[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silk[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Whales[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mausoleum of Maussollos[COLOR_REVERT] increases the length of your Golden Ages by fifty percent. It also increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
[ICON_BULLET]Can only be Built on %s1_Name and Earlier Starts
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Construction uniquement possible à l'époque "%s1_Name" et pour les débuts de partie plus précoces
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Kann nur im Zeitalter %s1_Name und früher errichtet werden
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Può essere costruito soltanto durante l'era %s1_Name o prima
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Solo se puede construir en [NUM1:el:la:los:las] %s1_Name e inicios anteriores

French.Text: Terrain de jeu de balle:Terrains de jeu de balle

Spanish.Text: Campo del juego de pelota:Campos del juego de pelota

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ball Court[COLOR_REVERT], the Mayan replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Amphitheatre[COLOR_REVERT], provides one extra happiness, requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Mathematics[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Construction[COLOR_REVERT] technology and grants experience points to melee and archery units built in its city.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Charreada Arena[COLOR_REVERT], the Mexican replacement for a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Amphitheatre[COLOR_REVERT], grants experience points to mounted units built in its city and increases happiness from access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]La Mezquita[COLOR_REVERT] gives 2 free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialists and grants the builder a free great person. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Military Academies[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's military unit production and provide culture.
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Military Encampment[COLOR_REVERT] grants additional experience points to troops built in their cities. Build them in all cities that will produce military units.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]camps militaires[COLOR_REVERT] octroient des points d'expérience supplémentaires aux troupes créées dans leur ville. Construisez-les dans toutes les villes qui produiront des unités militaires.
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ausbildungskaserne[COLOR_REVERT] gewährt den in der betreffenden Stadt errichteten Truppen zusätzliche Erfahrungspunkte. Bauen Sie sie in allen Städten, in denen Militäreinheiten ausgebildet werden.
TEXT.Italian: L'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]accampamento militare[COLOR_REVERT] concede punti esperienza extra alle unità sviluppate nella città. Costruiscilo in tutte le città adibite allo sviluppo delle truppe militari.
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Campamentos militares[COLOR_REVERT] dan puntos de experiencia adicionales a las tropas que se construyan en las ciudades donde se encuentren. Conviene construirlos en todas las ciudades que vayan a producir unidades militares.
[ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% a la producción de unidades militares

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+2[ICON_PRODUCTION] for all Water Improvements in your civilization[NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requires 20 Water Tiles in City Radius

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Moai Statues[COLOR_REVERT] add bonus production to all [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fishing Boats[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]High Sea Fishing Boats[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Whaling Boats[COLOR_REVERT] in your civilization. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ger[COLOR_REVERT], the Mongol replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stable[COLOR_REVERT], grant even more experience points to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mounted Units[COLOR_REVERT] built in its city. It also increases the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cows[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT].
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Noria[COLOR_REVERT], the Moorish replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueduct[COLOR_REVERT], provides a production bonus and is cheaper.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mt. Rushmore[COLOR_REVERT] decreases war weariness in all cities in your civilization and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Park[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases the health in your city. It also provides a free specialist for each [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Forest Preserve[COLOR_REVERT] in its city radius and increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Can only Construct %d1_Num National Wonders per City[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Construction de merveilles nationales limitée à %d1_Num par ville[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Puoi costruire soltanto %d1_Num Meraviglie Nazionali per città[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Solo se [NUM1:puede:pueden] erigir %d1_Num [NUM1:maravilla nacional:maravillas nacionales] por ciudad[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Totem Pole[COLOR_REVERT], the Native American replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monument[COLOR_REVERT], grants archery units three bonus experience in addition to the usual culture bonus.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]totem[COLOR_REVERT] (bâtiment amérindien qui remplace le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]monument[COLOR_REVERT]) confère aux unités équipées d'un arc trois points d'expérience supplémentaires en plus du bonus culturel habituel.
TEXT.German: Der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Totempfahl[COLOR_REVERT], die indianische Variante des [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monuments[COLOR_REVERT], gewährt Bogenschützen neben dem üblichen Kulturbonus auch 3 zusätzliche Erfahrungspunkte.
TEXT.Italian: Il [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Totem[COLOR_REVERT], l'equivalente per i Nativi Americani del [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monumento[COLOR_REVERT], dà alle unità di arcieri tre bonus di esperienza, oltre al solito bonus alla cultura.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Tótem[COLOR_REVERT], el sustituto indio americano del [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monumento[COLOR_REVERT], da 3 de bonificación de experiencia a las unidades de tiro con arco, además de la habitual a cultura.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Dike[COLOR_REVERT], the Dutch replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Levee[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Replaceable Parts[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Steam Power[COLOR_REVERT] technology and provides a production bonus from all water tiles worked by a city.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nezamiyeh[COLOR_REVERT], the Seljuk replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Library[COLOR_REVERT], provides an extra cultural boost and allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
[ICON_BULLET]No Anarchy[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Minimal wait between Civics or State Religion changes
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Aucune anarchie[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Attente minimale entre les changements de doctrine ou de religion d'Etat
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Keine Anarchie[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Änderungen von Staatsform oder Staatsreligion mit fast sofortiger Wirkung
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Nessuna Anarchia[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Attesa minima tra i cambiamenti di forma di governo o religione di stato.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Sin anarquía[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Espera mínima entre los cambios de principios o de religión oficial

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Pas de [ICON_UNHEALTHY] à cause de la population

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Notre Dame[COLOR_REVERT] increases the happiness of all of your cities. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nuclear Plants[COLOR_REVERT] provide pollution-free power for [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factories[COLOR_REVERT] with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Uranium[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Construction de bâtiments limitée à%d1_Num par ville[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Obelisks[COLOR_REVERT] provide a small amount of culture, and are a good way to expand city borders early on.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]obélisques[COLOR_REVERT] génèrent une faible quantité de culture et sont un bon moyen d'agrandir vos frontières culturelles au début du jeu.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Obelisken[COLOR_REVERT] erhöhen den kulturellen Wert einer Stadt und ermöglichen frühzeitig deren Ausbau.
TEXT.Italian: Gli [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]obelischi[COLOR_REVERT] forniscono una piccola quantità di cultura e servono a espandere velocemente i confini della città nelle fasi iniziali della partita.
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Obeliscos[COLOR_REVERT] proporcionan una pequeña cantidad de cultura y son una buena manera de ampliar las fronteras de una ciudad en los primeros tiempos.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Observatories[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's scientific research. They are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Laboratories[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Olympic Park[COLOR_REVERT] begins a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Golden Age[COLOR_REVERT] for your civilization. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Oracle[COLOR_REVERT] gives one free technology of your current or previous era, and it increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Orthodox Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Orthodoxy[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Orthodox Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Orthodox Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hagia Sophia[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Orthodox Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Orthodoxy[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Orthodoxy[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Churches[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Orthodox Temples[COLOR_REVERT]) increase a city's happiness and culture.
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hammam[COLOR_REVERT], the Ottoman replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueduct[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's happiness.

Spanish.Text: la Universidad de Oxford:las Universidades de Oxford

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temples[COLOR_REVERT] provide a small amount of culture.

The city containing the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Palace[COLOR_REVERT] is the capital of your civilization and city maintenance is decreased in cities near it. The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Palace[COLOR_REVERT] generates culture and a small amount of commerce.
TEXT.French: La ville qui abrite le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]palais[COLOR_REVERT] est la capitale de votre civilisation, ce qui réduit le coût d'entretien des villes qui l'entourent. Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]palais[COLOR_REVERT] génère de la culture et une petite quantité de commerce.
TEXT.German: Die Stadt mit dem [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Palast[COLOR_REVERT] ist die Hauptstadt Ihrer Zivilisation. Alle Städte in der Nähe haben niedrigere Unterhaltskosten. Der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Palast[COLOR_REVERT] wirkt sich positiv auf die Kultur und die Wirtschaft aus.
TEXT.Italian: La città contenente il [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]palazzo[COLOR_REVERT] diverrà la capitale della tua civiltà e il mantenimento delle città vicine verrà ridotto. Il [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]palazzo[COLOR_REVERT] genera cultura e una piccola quantità di commercio.
TEXT.Spanish: La ciudad que contenga el [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Palacio[COLOR_REVERT] será la capital de la civilización y el mantenimiento disminuirá en las ciudades cercanas. El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Palacio[COLOR_REVERT] genera cultura y una pequeña cantidad de comercio.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Parthenon[COLOR_REVERT] grants access to all [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Government[COLOR_REVERT] Civics. It also increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pentagon[COLOR_REVERT] grants experience points to troops built in all cities and increases the chance that its city will generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.Spanish: [SPACE]por cada especialista en todas las ciudades

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Apothecary[COLOR_REVERT], the Persian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's health and increases the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silk[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT].
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Glassmaker[COLOR_REVERT], the Phoenician replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's trade route yield.
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sejmik[COLOR_REVERT], the Polish replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Courthouse[COLOR_REVERT], provides a small cash and happiness bonus.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mala'e[COLOR_REVERT], the Polynesian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Amphitheatre[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Priesthood[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Construction[COLOR_REVERT] technology, is cheaper, provides culture and allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] and one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Porcelain Tower[COLOR_REVERT] gives 2 free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] specialists and counts all trade routes in your civilization as foreign. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Feitoria[COLOR_REVERT], the Portuguese replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Customs House[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Banking[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Astronomy[COLOR_REVERT] technologies, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Economics[COLOR_REVERT] technology and improves the commerce output of water plots.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Protestant Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Protestant Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Protestant Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]All Saints' Church[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Protestant Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Churches[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Protestant Temples[COLOR_REVERT]) increase a city's happiness and culture.
[ICON_BULLET]Provides Power ([ICON_POWER]) for All Cities on this Continent
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Fournit de l'énergie à toutes les villes de ce continent
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Liefert Energie für alle Städte auf diesem Kontinent
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Fornisce energia a tutte le città in questo continente
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Proporciona energía a todas las ciudades de este continente

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Public Transportation[COLOR_REVERT] provides a bonus to health in your city and an added bonus for access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Oil[COLOR_REVERT].
[ICON_BULLET]Hurry Unhappiness Does Not Increase with the Amount of Sacrificed Population
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Die Unzufriedenheit durch Sklaverei steigt nicht mit der Anzahl der geopferten Bevölkerung

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pyramids[COLOR_REVERT] makes slavery unhappiness not increase with the amount of population sacrificed, makes workers build improvements faster and centers the world map. They also increase their city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Recycling Centers[COLOR_REVERT] removes all unhealthiness from buildings.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Red Cross Society[COLOR_REVERT] gives all units built in its city the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Medic I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion, and it increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Croix-Rouge[COLOR_REVERT] attribue à toutes les unités formée dans la ville une promotion de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Médecin I[COLOR_REVERT] et augmente les chances d'apparition d'un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]savant illustre[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Hat eine Stadt das [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Rote Kreuz[COLOR_REVERT], erhalten alle dort gebauten Einheiten die Beförderung [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sanitäter I[COLOR_REVERT]. Darüber hinaus erhöhen sich die Chancen der Stadt, einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen Wissenschaftler[COLOR_REVERT] hervorzubringen.
TEXT.Italian: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Croce Rossa[COLOR_REVERT] dona a tutte le unità realizzate nella città la promozione [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Medico I[COLOR_REVERT] e aumenta la probabilità di generare un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grande Scienziato[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cruz Roja[COLOR_REVERT] otorga el ascenso de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Médica I[COLOR_REVERT] a todas las unidades que se construyan en su ciudad y aumenta las posibilidades de que ésta genere un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gran científico[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Red Fort[COLOR_REVERT] gives 2 free specialists. It also increase their city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change%F2_HappyOrUn, wenn die Religion %F3_RelIcon die [ICON_RELIGION] des Staates ist

TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requiere una unidad de nivel %d1_Num de experiencia[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Graceland[COLOR_REVERT] provides your civilization with seven [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Singles[COLOR_REVERT] resources (which provide happiness). It increases the odds that its city will create a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forum[COLOR_REVERT], the Roman replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT] birth rate and allows you to hire two [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Statesman[COLOR_REVERT] specialists.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Research Institute[COLOR_REVERT], the Russian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Laboratory[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Electricity[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Computers[COLOR_REVERT] technologyprovides a free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and allows you to hire one extra [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]San Marco Basilica[COLOR_REVERT] gives 2 trade routes and increases trade route yield by fifty percent. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]University of Sankore[COLOR_REVERT] gives all buildings of your state religion a research bonus. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Interpol Bureau[COLOR_REVERT] doubles its city's espionage output and gives experience points to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Espionage Units[COLOR_REVERT] built in it's city.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Security Bureaus[COLOR_REVERT] increase the cost of enemy espionage missions in their city, grant [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Informant I[COLOR_REVERT] to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Espionage Units[COLOR_REVERT] built in its city and are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lubyanka[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Shwedagon Paya[COLOR_REVERT] grants access to all [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Religious[COLOR_REVERT] Civics. It also increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sistine Chapel[COLOR_REVERT] causes each specialist in every city to generate culture and increases the culture bonus provided by buildings of your state religion. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Smokehouses[COLOR_REVERT] increase the city's health with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cows[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Deer[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pigs[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT].
Can only be built near the Equator
TEXT.French: Construction uniquement possible près de l'Equateur
TEXT.German: Kann nur in der Nähe des Äquators errichtet werden
TEXT.Italian: Può essere costruito solamente vicino all'equatore
TEXT.Spanish: Solo se puede construir cerca del Ecuador

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Space Elevator[COLOR_REVERT] increases spaceship part production in all of your cities and increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% a la producción de naves espaciales

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Production de vaisseau spatial dans toutes les villes %D1_Mod%%
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% sulla produzione dell'astronave in tutte le città
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% a la producción de naves espaciales en todas las ciudades

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Citadel[COLOR_REVERT], the Spanish replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castle[COLOR_REVERT], is half the production cost and grants experience points to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Siege Weapons[COLOR_REVERT] built in its city.
[ICON_BULLET]Great prophets can create great works like great artists.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Große Propheten können große Kunstwerke erstellen, genau wie große Künstler.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Sphinx[COLOR_REVERT] allows Great Prophets to create Great Works. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Spiral Minaret[COLOR_REVERT] gives all buildings of your state religion a gold bonus. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stables[COLOR_REVERT] grant experience points to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mounted Units[COLOR_REVERT] built in their cities.

TEXT.French: [SPACE]de tous les bâtiments liés à une [ICON_RELIGION] d'état
TEXT.Spanish: [SPACE]de todos los edificios de la [ICON_RELIGION] oficial

Spanish.Text: la Estatua de la Libertad:las Estatuas de la Libertad

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statue of Liberty[COLOR_REVERT] gives all cities in your civilization one free specialist. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statue de la Liberté[COLOR_REVERT] fait apparaître un spécialiste dans toutes vos villes et augmente les chances d'apparition d'un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]ingénieur illustre[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Durch den Bau der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Freiheitsstatue[COLOR_REVERT] erhalten alle Städte Ihrer Zivilisation einen Spezialisten. Darüber hinaus erhöhen sich die Chancen der Stadt, einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen Ingenieur[COLOR_REVERT] hervorzubringen.
TEXT.Italian: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statua della Libertà[COLOR_REVERT] concede a tutte le città della tua civiltà uno specialista gratis. Inoltre, aumenta la probabilità di generare un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grande Ingegnere[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Estatua de la Libertad[COLOR_REVERT] otorga un especialista gratis a todas las ciudades de la civilización. Incrementa también las posibilidades de que en su ciudad se genere un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gran ingeniero[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]No city resistance on conquest[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Increases military unit production speed by 25% in all cities with pagan temples
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Kein Widerstand nach Stadteroberung[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Erhöht die Produktionsgeschwindigkeit militärischer Einheiten in allen Städten mit heidnischen Tempeln um 25%

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statue of Zeus[COLOR_REVERT] removes city resistance on conquest and increases military production speed in cities with pagan temples. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Almacena el %d1_Mod%% de los [ICON_FOOD] tras el crecimiento

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ziggurat[COLOR_REVERT], the Babylonian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Polytheism[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Mysticism[COLOR_REVERT] technology, provides extra culture and gives a small science and culture boost.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Supermarkets[COLOR_REVERT] provide food and increase the city's health with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Corn[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rice[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wheat[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taj Mahal[COLOR_REVERT] begins a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Golden Age[COLOR_REVERT] for your civilization. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sangam[COLOR_REVERT], the Tamil replacement the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Library[COLOR_REVERT], provides an extra cultural boost and allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gong[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taoist Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Taoism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Toaist Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Taoist Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Dai Miao[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taoist Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Taoism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Taoism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taoist Temples[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and culture.
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Can only Construct %d1_Num Team Wonders per City[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Construction de merveilles d'équipe limitée à %d1_Num par ville[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Puoi costruire soltanto %d1_Num Meraviglie di Squadra per città[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Solo se [NUM1:puede:pueden] erigir %d1_Num [NUM1:maravilla de equipo:maravillas de equipo] por ciudad[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Doubles the revenue limit of all your shrines

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Solomon[COLOR_REVERT] provides one free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and doubles the Shrine gold limit from 20 to 40. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
[ICON_BULLET]Unlimited Experience from Barbarian Units[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Victories Against Barbarians Contribute to Great General Birth
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Unbegrenzte Erfahrung von barbarischen Einheiten[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Siege gegen Barbaren tragen zur Geburt großer Generäle bei

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Terracotta Army[COLOR_REVERT] removes the limit of experience gained from barbarians and allows barbarians to contribute to Great General birth. It also increases its city's production when creating military units and increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ho Trai[COLOR_REVERT], the Thai replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Library[COLOR_REVERT], increases happiness and is cheaper.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theatres[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's culture and increase the happiness output from using the culture slider. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theatres[COLOR_REVERT] also provide culture and is required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Opera House[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theodosian Walls[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's defenses against pre-gunpowder units. It also increases their city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

Spanish.Text: la Presa de las Tres Gargantas:las Presas de las Tres Gargantas

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Three Gorges Dam[COLOR_REVERT] provides clean power to all cities on the same continent. It increases the odds that its city will generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gompa[COLOR_REVERT], the Tibetan replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]University[COLOR_REVERT], provides less research, increases a city's defenses against pre-gunpowder units, allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialist, provides a free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialist, doesn't require a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Library[COLOR_REVERT], doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Education[COLOR_REVERT] technology and requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Paper[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Engineering[COLOR_REVERT] technologies.
[ICON_BULLET]Additional Foreign Culture is Converted on City Conquest
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Bei der Eroberung gegnerischer Städte wird zusätzliche Kultur konvertiert

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Topkapi Palace[COLOR_REVERT] increases the amount of culture converted on city conquest. It also increase their city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% al rendimiento de la ruta comercial

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change Routes commerciales dans toutes les villes
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change rotte commerciali in tutte le città
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change rutas comerciales en todas las ciudades

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Trading Company[COLOR_REVERT] generates income for each city with Trading Company has spread to. It generates health for its city with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT] and happiness for its city with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tea[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tobacco[COLOR_REVERT]. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merhant[COLOR_REVERT].
[ICON_BULLET]Requires a naval unit of level three or higher.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Benötigt eine Marineeinheit der Stufe drei oder höher.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Trafalgar Square[COLOR_REVERT] enables ships to be built much faster and the ships start off with additional experience points. It also increase its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Is automatically built on achievement of 2 Historical Goals out of 3[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Est automatiquement construit lorsque 2 objectifs historiques sur 3 sont atteints[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Wird bei Erfüllung von 2 von 3 Historischen Siegbedingungen automatisch erbaut[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Viene automaticamente costruito al raggiungimento di 2 obiettivi storici su 3[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Se construye automáticamente tras la consecución de 2 de los 3 objetivos históricos[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Triumphal Arch[COLOR_REVERT] begins a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Golden Age[COLOR_REVERT] for your civilization. It increases its city's production when creating military units.

TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Kann 1 Bürger in einen Spezialisten des Typs [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT][LINK=literal]%s1_SpecName[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT] verwandeln
[ICON_BULLET]Kann %d1_Num Bürger in einen Spezialisten des Typs [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT][LINK=literal]%s2_SpclstName[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT] verwandeln

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]United Nations[COLOR_REVERT] triggers [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Diplomatic Victory[COLOR_REVERT] elections. It guarantees that you will be a candidate in those elections and increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Universities[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's research and provide culture. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Universities[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]CERN Research Complex[COLOR_REVERT] world wonder.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Versailles[COLOR_REVERT] begins a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Golden Age[COLOR_REVERT] for your civilization. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]King's Saga[COLOR_REVERT] increases your production of Great People.
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Saga du Roi[COLOR_REVERT] améliore votre production de personnages illustres.
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Königssage[COLOR_REVERT] steigert die Produktion Großer Persönlichkeiten.
TEXT.Italian: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Saga dei Re[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta la produzione di Grandi Personaggi.
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Saga real[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta la generación de grandes personajes.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Legendary Saga[COLOR_REVERT] increases your production of military units.
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Saga légendaire[COLOR_REVERT] améliore votre production d'unités militaires.
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Vorzeitsaga[COLOR_REVERT] steigert die Produktion von Militäreinheiten.
TEXT.Italian: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Saga Leggendaria[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta la produzione di unità militari.
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Saga legendaria[COLOR_REVERT]aumenta la producción de unidades militares.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Shipyards[COLOR_REVERT] provide your ships with additional experience and increase your city's cultural output slightly.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]chantiers navals[COLOR_REVERT] donnent davantage d'expérience à vos navires et améliorent la culture générée par toutes les villes.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Schiffswerften[COLOR_REVERT] bieten Schiffen zusätzliche Erfahrungspunkte und bewirken einen leichten Anstieg des Kulturwertes einer Stadt.
TEXT.Italian: I [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]cantieri navali[COLOR_REVERT] danno un bonus di esperienza alle tue navi e aumentano leggermente la cultura prodotta dalle città.
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]astilleros[COLOR_REVERT] le proporcionan a tus barcos experiencia adicional y aumentan ligeramente la producción cultural de tus ciudades.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Trading Post[COLOR_REVERT], the Viking replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Sailing[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Compass[COLOR_REVERT] technology, gives all ships built in this city the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Navigation I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion and allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stock Exchange[COLOR_REVERT] doubles its city's production of wealth and increases its chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Walls[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's defenses against pre-gunpowder units. They are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET][ICON_UNHAPPY] dû à la guerre dans toutes les villes %D1_Mod%%
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% [ICON_UNHAPPY] per la guerra in tutte le città
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% al [ICON_UNHAPPY] bélico en todas las ciudades

TEXT.French: Toutes les cases d'eau des villes[SPACE]
TEXT.Italian: Caselle d'acqua di tutte le città
TEXT.Spanish: Todas las casillas de agua de ciudades

TEXT.English: All military units built in a city with a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]West Point[COLOR_REVERT] building begin with four additional experience points. Further, its city is more likely to generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Spy[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: Toutes les unités militaires formées dans une ville avec un bâtiment [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]West Point[COLOR_REVERT] commencent avec quatre points d'expérience supplémentaires. De plus, la ville qui abrite cette école militaire a plus de chances de voir apparaître un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]espion illustre[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Alle in [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]West Point[COLOR_REVERT] ausgebildeten Militäreinheiten erhalten vier zusätzliche Erfahrungspunkte. Darüber hinaus erhöhen sich die Chancen der jeweiligen Stadt, einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen Spion[COLOR_REVERT] hervorzubringen.
TEXT.Italian: Tutte le unità militari realizzate in una città con [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]West Point[COLOR_REVERT] cominciano con quattro punti esperienza extra. Inoltre, aumenta la probabilità di generare una [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grande Spia[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Todas las unidades militares construidas en una ciudad con el edificio de [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]West Point[COLOR_REVERT] empezarán con cuatro puntos de experiencia más. Además, será más probable que dicha ciudad genere un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gran espía[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Westminster Palace[COLOR_REVERT] reduces the cost of hurrying production and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]I lavoratori costruiscono i miglioramenti il %D1_Mod%% più rapidamente
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Los trabajadores construyen mejoras un %D1_Mod%% más rápido

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Can only Construct %d1_Num World Wonders per City[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Construction de merveilles mondiales limitée à %d1_Num par ville[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Puoi costruire soltanto %d1_Num Grandi Meraviglie per città[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Solo se [NUM1:puede:pueden] erigir %d1_Num [NUM1:maravilla del mundo:maravillas del mundo] por ciudad[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Royal Fire[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zoroastrian Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zoroastrian Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Zoroastrian Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Adur Farnbag[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zoroastrian Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT] throughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zoroastrian Temples[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and culture.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ikhandas[COLOR_REVERT], the Zulu replacements for [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Barracks[COLOR_REVERT], grant experience points to troops built in their cities, and lower city maintenance costs.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sun Tzu's Art of War[COLOR_REVERT] gives all units built on the same continent +1 Experience, good for those planning on military conquest.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]L'art de la guerre de Sun Tzu[COLOR_REVERT] donne +1 en expérience à toutes les unités présentes sur le continent. Utile pour les conquêtes militaires.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sun Tzus Kriegskunst[COLOR_REVERT] gewährt allen auf demselben Kontinent errichteten Einheiten je 1 zusätzlichen Erfahrungspunkt und erleichtert auf diese Weise insbesondere die Planung militärischer Feldzüge.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]L'arte della guerra di Sun Tzu[COLOR_REVERT] fornisce a tutte le unità costruite sul medesimo continente +1 di esperienza: utile per chi ha in mente grandi conquiste militari.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Tratado de Sun Tzu ("El Arte de la Guerra")[COLOR_REVERT] da +1 a Experiencia a todas las unidades creadas en el mismo continente, lo cual va muy bien para los que planeen una conquista militar.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Book of History[COLOR_REVERT] is a national wonder which gives the city it's built in increased Great Person generation.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Livre d'Histoire[COLOR_REVERT] est une merveille nationale qui augmente l'apparition de Général illustre dans la ville où il est construit.
TEXT.German: Das [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Buch der Geschichte[COLOR_REVERT] ist ein Nationales Wunder, das in der Stadt, in der es errichtet wird, eine Produktionssteigerung für Große Persönlichkeiten bewirkt.
TEXT.Italian: Il [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libro della storia[COLOR_REVERT] è una meraviglia nazionale che incrementa le probabilità di comparsa di un Grande Personaggio in città.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libro de la historia[COLOR_REVERT] es una maravilla nacional que otorga a la ciudad en la que se construye un aumento a la generación de grandes personajes.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Classical Library[COLOR_REVERT] grants 1 free technology upon completion.
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grande Bibliothèque Classique[COLOR_REVERT] rapporte, une fois terminée, 1 technologie gratuite.
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Große Klassische Bibliothek[COLOR_REVERT] gewährt ihrem Erbauer nach Fertigstellung 1 kostenlose Technologie.
TEXT.Italian: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grande Biblioteca Classica[COLOR_REVERT] garantisce una tecnologia gratis al suo completamento.
TEXT.Spanish: Completar la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gran Biblioteca clásica[COLOR_REVERT] otorga una tecnología gratuita.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Emperor's Council[COLOR_REVERT] is the key to the diplomatic victory. Once built a vote will be held for the leader of the Council and shortly afterwards a second for the game's diplomatic victor.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Conseil de l'Empereur[COLOR_REVERT] est la clé de la victoire diplomatique. Après sa construction, le chef du Conseil sera élu, puis un vote déterminera le vainqueur diplomatique de la partie.
TEXT.German: Der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kaiserliche Rat[COLOR_REVERT] ist der Schlüssel zum diplomatischen Sieg. Nach seiner Fertigstellung wird zunächst der Ratsvorsitzende gewählt und kurze Zeit später wird in einem zweiten Wahlgang entschieden, wer der diplomatische Sieger des Spiels sein wird.
TEXT.Italian: Il [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Consiglio dell'Imperatore[COLOR_REVERT] rappresenta la chiave per la vittoria diplomatica. Una volta creato, si voterà per eleggere il capo del Consiglio e, poco dopo, per eleggere il vincitore diplomatico della partita.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Concilio imperial[COLOR_REVERT] es la clave de la victoria diplomática. Una vez construido, se hará una votación para elegir al líder del concilio y, poco después, otra para decidir quién gana la partida por victoria diplomática.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Family Altar[COLOR_REVERT] provides a small culture bonus and allows 1 Priest specialist, but their most important function is to allow the construction of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Family Emissary[COLOR_REVERT] units, vital to spreading 'bloodlines' and forging diplomatic ties.
TEXT.French: L'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]autel familial[COLOR_REVERT] fournit un petit bonus de culture, et permet d'avoir 1 prêtre. Mais sa fonction principale est de permettre de construire des unités d'[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]émissaires familiaux[COLOR_REVERT], essentiels pour étendre la 'lignée' et nouer des liens diplomatiques.
TEXT.German: Der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ahnenschrein[COLOR_REVERT] erhöht den kulturellen Wert einer Stadt und gewährt einen Priester-Spezialisten. Seine wichtigste Funktion ist jedoch, dass er die Ausbildung von [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Glaubensboten[COLOR_REVERT] ermöglicht, die für die Verbreitung des eigenen Familienglaubens und die Aufnahme diplomatischer Beziehungen sorgen.
TEXT.Italian: L'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]altare di famiglia[COLOR_REVERT] fornisce un piccolo bonus in cultura e permette la presenza di un sacerdote, ma soprattutto permette la creazione degli [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]emissari di famiglia[COLOR_REVERT], necessari per l'espansione della linea di sangue stringendo legami diplomatici con le altre famiglie.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Altar familiar[COLOR_REVERT] da una pequeña bonificación a la cultura y permite un sacerdote especialista pero su función principal es que permite crear unidades de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Emisarios de la familia[COLOR_REVERT], vitales para ampliar el linaje y forjar lazos diplomáticos.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Wall[COLOR_REVERT] is a national wonder which gives every city a growth boost with +1 Population and +1 Health while also (and perhaps more importantly) preventing barbarians from crossing into your territory.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Réseau de murailles[COLOR_REVERT] est une merveille nationale qui favorise la croissance de toutes les villes en leur fournissant +1 en population et en santé. Il permet aussi (et c'est peut-être le plus important) d'empêcher les barbares de pénétrer sur votre territoire.
TEXT.German: Bei der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nationalen Schutzmauer[COLOR_REVERT] handelt es sich um ein Nationales Wunder, das mit +1 Bevölkerung und +1 Gesundheit einen Wachstumsanstieg in jeder eigenen Stadt bewirkt und darüber hinaus den Barbaren den Zugang zum eigenen Territorium verwehrt.
TEXT.Italian: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mura nazionali[COLOR_REVERT] sono una meraviglia nazionale che accelera la crescita di tutte le città fornendo +1 di popolazione e +1 di salute; inoltre (o forse soprattutto) impediscono ai barbari di penetrare nel tuo territorio .
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Muralla nacional[COLOR_REVERT] es una maravilla nacional que otorga a cada ciudad una mejora al crecimiento de +1 a población y salud a la vez que (y quizá esto sea lo más importante) evita que los bárbaros entren en tu territorio.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple[COLOR_REVERT] is a cultural building which provides a small bit of Happiness to the city it's built in.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]temple[COLOR_REVERT] est un bâtiment culturel qui fournit un peu de bonheur à la ville dans laquelle il est construit.
TEXT.German: Der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Tempel[COLOR_REVERT] ist ein kulturelles Gebäude, das zur Steigerung der Zufriedenheit innerhalb der Stadt beiträgt, in der es errichtet wurde.
TEXT.Italian: Il [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]tempio[COLOR_REVERT] è un edificio culturale che fornisce un po' di felicità alla città in cui viene eretto.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Templo[COLOR_REVERT] es un edificio cultural que otorga algo de felicidad a la ciudad en la que se construye.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Underground Tomb[COLOR_REVERT] is a multi-faceted wonder, eliminating 75% of the War Weariness in your cities while also providing +1 free Specialists to all of your cities.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Tombeau souterrain[COLOR_REVERT] est une merveille qui élimine 75 % de la lassitude de la guerre et fournit 1 spécialiste à toutes vos villes.
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Unterirdische Grabstätte[COLOR_REVERT] ist ein vielseitiges Wunder, das die Kriegsmüdigkeit in den eigenen Städten um 75% senkt und darüber hinaus auch je einen Bonus-Spezialisten in allen eigenen Städten zur Verfügung stellt.
TEXT.Italian: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Tomba sotterranea[COLOR_REVERT] è una meraviglia dalle molte utilità: annulla il 75% della stanchezza da guerra nelle città e fornisce uno specialista gratis a ciascuna città.
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Tumba subterránea[COLOR_REVERT] es una maravilla polifacética: elimina el 75% del hastío bélico en tus ciudades y les otorga a todas ellas +1 especialista gratis.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]Space Program[COLOR_REVERT] is required to create the [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Cockpit[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Life Support[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Stasis Chamber[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Docking Bay[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Engines[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Casings[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Thrusters[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.Italian: Raddoppia la velocità di produzione con [LINK=literal]%s1_Bonus[\LINK]
TEXT.Spanish: Dobla la velocidad de producción con [LINK=literal]%s1_Bonus[\LINK]

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]Manhattan Project[COLOR_REVERT] is required to create [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SDI[COLOR_REVERT]. It also allows you to construct [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]ICBMs[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Tactical Nukes[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bomb Shelters[COLOR_REVERT].

[ICON_BULLET]Removes one non-state religion from this city[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Causes temporary disorder and unhappiness[NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requires a State Religion and your city to have at least one non-state religion[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Only one can be under construction at any time[COLOR_REVERT]
[COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]Persecution[COLOR_REVERT] removes one non-state religion in the city along with all of that religions buildings. This causes temporary disorder and unhappiness.

TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requis pour une victoire de type : %s1_Name (%d2_NumTotal au total)[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Se requiere para una victoria %s1_Name (%d2_NumTotal en total)[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requis pour une victoire de type : %s1_Name (%d2_NumCurr/%d3_NumTotal au total)[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Se requiere para una victoria %s1_Name (%d2_NumCurr de un total de %d3_NumTotal)[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SDI[COLOR_REVERT] gives a fifty percent chance of intercepting nukes.

[COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Casings[COLOR_REVERT] are required to achieve the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Space Race[COLOR_REVERT] victory condition. Increases the chance of a successful mission for the spaceship.
The [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Cockpit[COLOR_REVERT] is required to achieve the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Space Race[COLOR_REVERT] victory condition.
The [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Docking Bay[COLOR_REVERT] is required to achieve the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Space Race[COLOR_REVERT] victory condition.
[COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Engines[COLOR_REVERT] are required to achieve the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Space Race[COLOR_REVERT] victory condition. They also increase the speed of the spaceship.
The [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Life Support[COLOR_REVERT] is required to achieve the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Space Race[COLOR_REVERT] victory condition.
A component of a space ship, required to achieve the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Space Race[COLOR_REVERT] victory condition.
TEXT.French: Composant du vaisseau spatial, nécessaire pour remporter la victoire en mode [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]"Course à l'espace"[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Eine Raumschiffkomponente. Wird für die Erfüllung der Siegbedingung [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Weltraumrennen[COLOR_REVERT] benötigt.
TEXT.Italian: Componente dell'astronave, richiesta per il raggiungimento della condizione di vittoria[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Corsa spaziale[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Un componente de la nave espacial necesaria para conseguir la condición de victoria [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]por carrera espacial[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Stasis Chamber[COLOR_REVERT] is required to achieve the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Space Race[COLOR_REVERT] victory condition.
[COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Thrusters[COLOR_REVERT] are required to achieve the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Space Race[COLOR_REVERT] victory condition. They also increase the speed of the spaceship.
[ICON_BULLET]Increases the Chance of a Successful Mission for the Spaceship
[ICON_BULLET]Increases the Chance of a Successful Mission for the Spaceship

Spanish.Text: Muelle de acoplamiento para naves espaciales

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Grants all Technologies acquired by any %d1_Num Known [NUM1:Civilization:Civilizations]
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Octroie toutes les technologies acquises par %d1_Num [NUM1:civilisation connue:civilisations connues]
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Stellt alle von %d1_Num bekannten [NUM1:Zivilisation:Zivilisationen] erworbenen Technologien zur Verfügung
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Concede tutte le tecnologie scoperte da %d1_Num civiltà [NUM1:conosciuta:conosciute]
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Otorga todas las tecnologías adquiridas por %d1_Num [NUM1:civilización cualquiera conocida:civilizaciones cualesquiera conocidas]

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]Internet[COLOR_REVERT] grants all technologies that are already discovered by 2 known civilizations.
